angulargmUtils
service in module angulargm

Description

Common utility functions.

Methods

  • boundsEqual(b1, b2)

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    b1google.maps.LatLngBounds

    first

    b2google.maps.LatLngBounds

    second

    Returns
    boolean

    true if b1 and b2 are 'very close'. If either are null or not google.maps.LatLngBounds objects returns false.

  • hasNaN(latLng)

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    latLnggoogle.maps.LatLng

    the LatLng

    Returns
    boolean

    true if either lat or lng of latLng is null or isNaN

  • latLngEqual(l1, l2)

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    l1google.maps.LatLng

    first

    l2google.maps.LatLng

    second

    Returns
    boolean

    true if l1 and l2 are 'very close'. If either are null or not google.maps.LatLng objects returns false.

  • latLngToObj(latLng)

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    latLnggoogle.maps.LatLng

    the LatLng

    Returns
    Object

    object literal with 'lat' and 'lng' properties.

  • objToLatLng(obj)

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    objObject

    of the form { lat: 40, lng: -120 }

    Returns
    google.maps.LatLng

    returns null if problems with obj (null, NaN, etc.)
